title: Reality and Truth, God #1 and God #2, Metaphors of reality, and the L and R Hemispheres of the Brain
description: Today, Karl and I quite literally hammer out our differences, and once we get the bumper flattened out and smooth and shiny, we could see ourselves in the reflection! We are navigating two different world views and both seeking Truth. It's a great ride!
